intro.title: Our Terms & Policies
intro.description: We're committed to transparency and your privacy. Below you'll find everything you need to know about how we handle your data and our community expectations.

terms.title: Privacy
terms.content: We respect your privacy. Keldo Bot does not collect personal information beyond what is necessary for gameplay. No messages or server data are stored outside of Discord.

terms.title: Data Usage
terms.content: All data is used solely to provide and improve the Keldo game experience. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.

terms.title: Security
terms.content: We use Discord's secure APIs and follow best practices to keep your data safe. If you find a vulnerability, please contact us immediately.

terms.title: Community Guidelines
terms.content: Be respectful and follow Discord's Terms of Service. Abuse, harassment, or cheating will result in bans from the bot.

terms.title: Contact
terms.content: For questions or concerns, email us at trungkienhuynh.contact@gmail.com.
